bio: Shining mysteriously in the night sky, Neighfarious is a bit of an enigma. What kind of evil Yo-kai is he?

soultimate.name: Dark Horse
soultimate.inspiritEffects: Drops foe's Defense by 40% for 30 seconds.
soultimate.description: Foes' defense is greatly decreased for a time.

skill.effect: 10% Atk 70% Def 8% Spd 20% MM ↑ when Inspirited ↓.
